title: Minister Hong attends a ceremony held to celebrate the 25th anniversary of German Unification (Ministry ...
text: ( Source : Ministry of Unification of the Republic of Korea ) The ceremony, held by the Hessen Province , took place in Frankfurt on October 3. On the same day, Minister Hong had an open forum with Iris Gleicke, the German government 's
